about_the_game:
• Hop your way to the top with a pogo stick in this thrilling and challenging platformer!

    Whether you’re playing solo or teaming up with friends in online multiplayer, you’ll face towering obstacles and unforgiving terrain in a dense, atmospheric forest. Precision, timing, and patience are your greatest allies as you navigate a world designed to test your skills and persistence.

    What’s included in the demo:

    • A Smaller Map: Experience a condensed version of the full game’s environment, with all the thrills and challenges packed into a shorter climb.

    • Solo Play: Tackle the forest alone and master the art of pogo stick precision.

    • Online Multiplayer: Connect with friends or players worldwide to bounce, race, or even stumble to the top together.

    Will you conquer the climb, or will the forest floor catch you over and over again? Test your skills, embrace the challenge, and get a taste of what’s to come in this exhilarating pogo-stick adventure!

name: Hop On It Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Hop your way to the top with a pogo stick! Alone or with friends, take on a tough challenge in a harsh forest as you climb towering obstacles. This demo includes a smaller version of the map, and supports both solo play and online multiplayer.
